document_title: Tetralogy of Fallot (Fallot 4): Causes, signs and complications
subsection_content:
According to Dr. Pham Thuc Minh Thuy, congenital heart diseases are often discovered accidentally, the cause of the disease is unknown. Therefore, it is difficult to predict which children are at risk of getting the disease. However, some risk factors leading to this disease include:
Some cases have been reported to have a family history, so genetic factors have been verified to be involved.; Parents whose children have tetralogy of Fallot or another congenital heart disease have a higher risk of congenital heart disease when they have a second child.
